A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You’ll either hate it or love it. After a 2nd time\, I loved it. I knew this film would be different going into it. The first 60 minutes of it I was pretty disappointed\, then they started throwing all sorts of curve balls and surprises. Overall I feel that the unique approach brought a new light to Star Wars that will be interesting to see grow. But just as their is is new light there is new darkness.. could have done with out some of the unnecessary “flying” and comedic breaks... thank you for not just being a fan fare and writing a NEW chapter. This wasnt a rewriting of an old movie with new characters.
